H0.text: Flower takes in minerals and water in a dandelion plant.

H1.text: Leaf is the part of a dandelion plant that takes in minerals and water.

H2.text: Root is the part of a dandelion plant that takes in minerals and water.

H3.text: Stem is the part of a dandelion plant that takes in minerals and water.

A4.text: The root brings up nutrients for shallow-rooting plants when used as a companion plant.
